item.title: LUKE BURGIS: How humans “want”: Mimetic desire explained
item.description: Luke Burgis (ethical entrepreneur, mimetic desire expert) reckons none of us knows what we want. We like to think we are incredibly original creators of our artfully curated lives. But, in fact, we only ever mimic others’ desires. Luke’s thesis draws on the work of philosopher Rene Girard who coined the term “mimetic desire” and who has become an obsession among Silicon Valley bros. I was keen to find out why Girard’s idea has become so hot and asked Luke to join me to put things straight... Feed: https://feeds.acast.com/public/shows/62538867ad55de001281af36

item.title: Angry Mob burns down Church in Faisalabad - TLP, TTP, PML-N and PTI - How did Pakistan get here?
